GSP29vnyps51u:2: nyā. pa. prame. 1 evaṃ saparikaraṃ pramāṇaṃ viśodhitam /
GSP29vnyps51u:4: tatra yat punaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa padārthān vibhajya vaiśeṣikādayaścintayanti,
GSP29vnyps51u:15: yadapi ca--- dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyarūpeṇa bhāvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣoḍhā parisaṃkhyānam,
GSP29vnyps51u:16: tadapi vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇe “samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ” iti sūtrakāraireva samavāyākhyapadārthāntaradūśaṇena parāstam /
GSP29vnyps51u:18: yaścānyonyamatyantatulyeṣu muktātmādiṣu mitho vyāvṛttadhījananāya dravyatvādihetunā viśeṣākhyaḥ padārthaḥ kalpyate,
GSP29vnyps51u:21: api cānityeṣu dravyeṣu tāvajjātiguṇapādibhireva vyāvṛttadhīḥ sidhyatīti nityeṣu hi viśeṣonyaḥ kalpyate;
GSP29vnyps51u:33: tadatyantasāmyavatsu mukteṣu nityeṣvapi hi tatsāmyasyaiva saṃrakṣaṇāya dharmigrāhakasiddhā yāvadātmabhāvinaste te viśeṣā na parityaktāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:37: asyaiva ca sāmānyaśabdairviśeṣaśabdaiśca rūḍhito yogatastattadvasatuviśiṣṭatvādinā ca tattatprakaraṇānuguṇaṃ śarīrake pratipādyatvasthāpanāt
GSP29vnyps51u:41: muktadaśāyāṃ nityebhyaḥ kiṃ vaiṣmyamiti cet, kiṃ tena ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:43: siddhairapi tadvyavahāre prāktanopādhibhedaireva tattatpramāṇapramitaiḥ pratisaṃhitaiḥ sarvanirvāhāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:47: tadatadvibhāgo hi tatkālavartinaivaṃ dharmeṇeti na niyamaḥ,
GSP29vnyps51u:53: teṣāmapi hi satyasaṃkalpānāṃ vicitrāḥ saṃkalpecchādaya riśvarasyevāniyatadeśakālaviṣayāparyanuyojyasāmagrīkā anādyanantasaṃtānavantaḥ santīti kimanyena viśeṣeṇa ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:54: api ca yaddarśane yatra yadāropo na bhavati sa hi tasya tato bhedaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:56: sa cet svarūpabhūtohantvamādirūpeṇa bhātaḥ parāropaṃ pratirundhyāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:61: api ca pṛthaktve vidyamāne kiṃ tairviśeṣaiḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:65: viśeṣatvaṃ nāma jātirnāstīti cet, kiṃ tat ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:72: na punaḥ parābhimatamavayavyākhyaṃ dravyamastīti samarthanād ghaṭādyavayavyabhāve
GSP29vnyps51u:75: tat parairapi kāryatayābhyupetamupalambhādibhiśca tathaiva sidhyatīti na tatrāpi nityatvakalpanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:76: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ svarūpatonādyanantatvāt kāryadravyatvātmatvādimātrameva śiṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:81: saṃsthānaṃ nāma svāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamiti yathāvastu saṃsthānamanusaṃdheyam” iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:86: atiriktasāmānyamabhyupagacchatopi hi tadupalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsthānamiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca /
GSP29vnyps51u:94: tavāpi vā tatra sāmānyamupalakṣaṇena saṃgṛhyate, na vā ?
GSP29vnyps51u:97: vyāvṛttānāmapi svabhāvata eva kāsāṃcit vyaktīnāṃ tadvyañjakatvaniyatiriti cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:98: sa eva svabhāvaḥ kiṃ na vyavahāraṃ niyachet /
GSP29vnyps51u:102: vyāvṛttānāmanuvṛttavyañjakatve sarvatra tadvyaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:106: tathāpi dṛṣṭaikagovyaktervyaktyantare soyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
GSP29vnyps51u:107: ayaṃ gaurityekavyaktau vyutpāditaśca kathaṃ vyaktyatyantarepi tacchabdavācyatāṃ pratīyāt ?
GSP29vnyps51u:110: tenaiva dharmeṇa svato militasya samavāyasyaiva nityaṃ sarvatra vṛttyabhyupagamena sarvatra sarvavyavahārasaṃkaraprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:113: tathā sati bhrāntatvaṃ tayoḥ syāditi cenna,
GSP29vnyps51u:115: api tarhi tathātvena vyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ tathātvaṃ nāmāntareṇa jātireva syāditi cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:116: tajjātivyañjakaṃ tattadekavyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ kiṃ na jātyantaraṃ syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:118: evaṃ tarhi pratiniyatapratiyogikaṃ svabhāvaniyataṃ parasparasmārakatvamupajīvya tajjātīyatayā pratisaṃdhānavyavahāropapattau kimanyakalpanena
GSP29vnyps51u:127: tulyam; anyathā saṃbandhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vaikamupādāya tadanyasya kathaṃ smārakatvamiti codyasya durvāratvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:134: evaṃ sāmānyādiṣu sūtrakārādibhirnirasteṣu pariśiṣṭā dravyaguṇakarmarūpāstrayaḥ padārthāḥ iti kecidācāryāḥ //
GSP29vnyps51u:135: nyā. pa. prame. 2 anye tu manyante---yathā tatpratīteranyathāsiddhatayā te padārthā bhāṣyakārādibhirnirasyante,
GSP29vnyps51u:137: ye tāvadiha sarvatra sūryaparispandādivadapratyakṣaṃ karma phalānumeyamicchanti /
GSP29vnyps51u:138: tatra yayā sāmagryā karmaṇaḥ siddhirabhimatā tayaiva dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ sādhyatām,
GSP29vnyps51u:144: tairapi nūnaṃ karmaphalatvenābhyupagamasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ nipuṇanirīkṣaṇepi nopalabhyata iti manyāmahe /
GSP29vnyps51u:146: na ca vācyaṃ yāvatsaṃyogaṃ calatipratyayaprasaṅga iti,
GSP29vnyps51u:148: tata eva hyuttarakāle saṃyoge vartamānepyacaladiti bhūtānusaṃdhānamupapannam /
GSP29vnyps51u:149: nanu pravāhamadhyasthite sthāṇau pūrvasalilaskandhaviyogaḥ uttarasalilaskandhayogaśca dṛśyate,
GSP29vnyps51u:151: vyomādaya eva sthiradeśatvena vivakṣitāḥ iti cenna,
GSP29vnyps51u:154: tarhi saṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ laulyarūpaṃ karmapratyakṣamiti kathaṃ tadapahnavaḥ ? iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:155: tatrāhuḥ---yā nāma karmasāmagrī tvayeṣyate sā tattatkarmaphalatayābhimataṃ saṃyogaviśeṣamutpādayantī niyatasvabhāvameva tamutpādayati /
GSP29vnyps51u:156: ata eva eva saṃyogonekaniṣṭhopi san kvaciccalatipratyaṃyaṃ kvacit saṃyogamātrapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
GSP29vnyps51u:157: yathaika eva samavāyoguṇaguṇibhyāmaviśeṣeṇa svato militopi san kvacidāśrayapratyayaṃ kvacidāśritapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
GSP29vnyps51u:163: idaṃ tu manyāmahe--- atirekepi guṇavargānna rāśyantaraṃ karma,
GSP29vnyps51u:165: svecchākalpitavibhājakasya sarvatra sulabhatvena yathābhimatamekaṃ guṇamubhayaṃ vāṅgīkṛtya rāśyantarakalpanaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:168: nyā. pa. prame. 3 tatra cātmaguṇatayābhimateṣu sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ pañca tattadutpādakatayābhimatabuddhiviśeṣānatiriktā vedārthasaṃgrahe samarthitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:169: dharmādharmau vihitaniṣiddhakriyāsādhyatayābhimatāvājñāvato rājña iva sarvapraśāsiturīśvarasyānugrahanigrahākhyabuddhiviśeṣarūpau bhāṣyādiṣu bahuṣu pradeśeṣu prapañcitau /
GSP29vnyps51u:174: nyā. pa. prame. 4 yadyapi “indriyasyendriyasyārthe” ityādigītāślokeṣu bhāṣyakārairvāsanāyā icchādvāreṇaiva pravṛttihetutvavacanājjñānavāsanāviśeṣātiriktā karmavāsanā nāsti,
GSP29vnyps51u:179: nyā. pa. prame. 5 ye tu paraparibhāṣamanusarantastadanuguṇaṃ tasya guṇatvaṃ gṛhṇanti,
GSP29vnyps51u:182: na ca buddhornityatvaṃ saṃkocavikāsādidaśābhedaṃ cābhyupagacchadbhiradravyatvaṃ tasyāḥ suvacam;
GSP29vnyps51u:197: sthitasthāpakau tu karmanivṛttāvapi tadavinābhūtasaṃyogaviśeṣatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam //
GSP29vnyps51u:198: nyā. pa. prame. 6 ye ca bhagavatonantā maṅgalaguṇāḥ prakīrtyante,
GSP29vnyps51u:215: vilakṣaṇo guṇaviśeṣaḥ prabhākarādinayena padārthāntaraṃ vā iti cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:228: nyā. pa. prame. 7 athāciddravyaviśeṣaguṇān paśyāmaḥ--- tatra śabdādayaḥ pañca tattadbhūtavartinaḥ pratyakṣādibalādabhyupagatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:240: tatkalpane ca prāktvapratyaktvādayopi hi bahavo guṇāstulyanyāyāḥ kalpyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:243: nyā. pa. prame. 8 atha dravyāṇi vimṛśyante--- tatra tāvat kaumārilābhimatavibhuśabdākhyadravyavādaḥ śabdasyācidavasthāviśeṣatvena śrutyādisiddhatvānnirākāryaḥ
GSP29vnyps51u:248: tathā hyuktaṃ varadagurubhistattvasāre--- “tamo nāma dravyaṃ bahulaviralaṃ mecakacalaṃ pratīmaḥ kenāpi kvacidapi na bādhaśca dadṛśe /
GSP29vnyps51u:249: ataḥ kalpyo hetuḥ pramitirapi śābdī vijayate nirālokaṃ cakṣuḥ prathayati hi tad darśanavaśāt” //
GSP29vnyps51u:251: etena viyati vitatānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ pṛthivyavayavānāṃ kṛṣṇo guṇastama iti pakṣopi pratikṣiptaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:254: sparśarūparasānāṃ ca śabdagandhavad bhrāntau pramitau vā nirādhāragrahaṇādarśanācca--iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:255: evaṃ dravyatve siddhe kṛṣṇavarṇasya dravyasya pṛthivītvamevābhyupagantumucitam,
GSP29vnyps51u:261: nanvevamākāśameva dravyāntarasaṃsargānnīlaṃ tama ityupalabhyate iti syāditi cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:270: divābhītānāṃ viśiṣṭāñjanarañjitākṣāṇāṃ cālokanirapekṣameva cakṣuṣaiva padārthā gṛhyante /
GSP29vnyps51u:274: pṛthivyādīni pañca bhūtāni manaśca triguṇadravyapariṇativiśeṣatayā śrutyādisiddhatvānna pṛthagdravyāṇi /
GSP29vnyps51u:275: tatra cāvayavyākhyaṃ bhautikadravyam “tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ” ityādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sūtrairbuddhiśabdāntarāderanyathāsiddhyādyupapādanena nirastam /
GSP29vnyps51u:288: tasya hi cetanatvādibhiḥ saṃgrahasaṃbhavepyavāntaravailakṣaṇyajñāpanāya pṛthaksaṃkhyānaṃ prācāmanādivācāṃ ca,
GSP29vnyps51u:290: viviktaṃ ca bhagavatā parāśareṇa--- “paramātmātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:297: bhoktṛbhogyaniyantṝṇāṃ sadātmanaikadravyatvādipakṣā api nirviśeṣasanmātrapakṣavad vyāghātaśrutivirodhādibhirbahuśo bhāṣyādiṣu nirastāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:305: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye prathamamāhnikam
